title: Gisele‚Äôs shameless Super Bowl antics

organizations.name: getty ian horswill news corp australia network

text:
Gisele B√ºndchen‚Äôs epic celebration as husband Tom Brady wins his fifth Super Bowl February 6, 2017 6:02pm Image Snapshot of SB halftime show 0:20 
NFL: A time lapse has captured the scale of production that goes into the brilliance of the Super Bowl halftime show February 6th 2017 3 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/More Sports/ Gisele B√ºndchen and her daughter Vivian Lake celebrate with LeGarrette Blount of the New England Patriots during Super Bowl 51 at NRG Stadium in Houston. Picture: Bob Levey / Getty Ian Horswill News Corp Australia Network Share Share on Twitter 
AS celebrations go, did Tom Brady‚Äôs wife, the international model Gisele B√ºndchen, go just a little too hysterical at his fifth Super Bowl triumph? 
B√ºndchen went wild at the New England Patriots ‚Äô improbable come-from-behind victory in overtime at Super Bowl 51 in Houston, Texas. 
The 36-year-old Brazilian screamed with delight and shook her hair, all while making sure she filmed herself on her mobile. Gisele B√ºndchen films herself going wild as her husband Tom Brady‚Äôs Patriots win a dramatic Super Bowl. Picture: Source: Supplied 
She was also filmed wilding gesticulating with her arms at the overtime win. Hey @giseleofficial , are you excited the @patriots won the Super Bowl? üòÇ #SB51 pic.twitter.com/TPhWCn7LuO 
The fact that the pictures are yet to surface on her social media accounts might be due to the fact that she dropped the phone. Gisele celebrates by spiking her phone. #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/ttMMA81HfX ‚Äî the makers market (@MMinTuscaloosa) February 6, 2017 
Brady became the first quarterback to win five Super Bowl titles after engineering an incredible comeback from the Patriots, who were down 21-0 at one point. 
Christinie Brown on Twitter referred to B√ºndchen as ‚Äúhella amped‚Äù after the win. What a game!!!! I'm as pumped as @giseleofficial right now #superbowl #SuperBowl2017 pic.twitter.com/lw2oMWXqea 
B√ºndchen, who has two children with Brady ‚Äî Vivian and Benjamin, went straight down to the field with Vivian to celebrate with her husband. photo gallery Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen celebrate Super Bowl win New England Patriots‚Äô Tom Brady is surrounded by his family after defeating the Atlanta Falcons 34-28 in overtime to win Super Bowl 51 at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. The Patriots defeated the Falcons 34-28.
